backgroundInformationList.description: CANCELLATION - Notice of Public Meeting Regarding Development Charges

contact.locationName: Toronto City Hall, 10th Floor, West Tower

noticeDescription:
A Notice of Public Meeting was previously mailed and/or published on March 9, 2022.  Please be advised that the proposed development charge by-law and background study will NOT be considered by the Executive Committee on March 30, 2022.

 

This Public Meeting has been CANCELLED and will be RE-SCHEDULED.  Full details of the re-scheduled Public Meeting will be issued at a later date.
title: CANCELLATION - Notice of Public Meeting Regarding Development Charges
